transcript: never had a period in my life where I wondered if I had What it Took because I was always willing to give everything that I had it was never like do I have what it takes it was more like I'm willing to sacrifice everything for this to work and to me that is unreasonable that it would not work on a long enough time Horizon if I give it my all it was always just a question of when not if I was confident that it would happen eventually
